title: Bottega Veneta The Pouch Shoulder Bag
description: Bottega Veneta 'The Pouch' shoulder bag in white calfskin leather. Featuring ruched detailing, and concealed magnetic closure. This opens to a colour matching leather interior. Approximate dimensions: 36cm(Base-L) x 20cm(H) x 15cm(D), handle drop 13cm. Accompanied by BV dustbag. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
